Grouped_Utterances: Hi! I’ve been okay, a bit anxious about the hearing, but I did manage to write down my feelings.

It was really helpful. I wrote about my worries and even some positive things that have happened. I wrote about the small gigs I’ve had and how nice it was to reconnect with an old client. It felt good! She was really supportive and encouraged me to keep pushing forward. I’ve been thinking about reaching out to some local photographers for potential collaborations. Yes, it feels like I’m reconnecting with myself. It’s still there, but I’ve been trying to manage it with meditation and journaling. I’m still nervous, but I feel a bit more prepared. Writing helped me organize my thoughts. I’m resilient and creative. Despite everything, I keep pushing forward. I think I’m good for now. I’m feeling more hopeful.
Yes, I’ve tried to plan some solo activities. I went to an art class and it was amazing! It was refreshing. I forgot how much I loved painting. It brought back a lot of joy.
That could be helpful. I’ll try to remind myself of my strengths.
